name: @vforvasile/react-native-photos-framework
description: Fork from https://github.com/olofd/react-native-photos-framework with RN 0.59 issue, removed Android script, lib for IOS only

scripts.test-ios: set -o pipefail && xcodebuild test -verbose -project example/ios/Example.xcodeproj -scheme Example -destination 'id=E40727B3-41FB-4D6E-B4CB-BFA87109EB12' | xcpretty
scripts.update: git add . && git commit -m "Updated" && npm version patch && git push --tags && git push origin master && npm publish
scripts.update-small: git add . && git commit -m "Updated" && git push origin master

author: VforVasile
